span.t-esc: (employee.firstName if employee.firstName else '') +' ' + (employee.middleName if employee.middleName else '' )+' '+ (employee.lastName if employee.lastName else '')

p.span: الاسم الثلاثي ورقم هاتف آخر في قطر للطوارئ:

t.t-if: employee.gender in ['male','female'] and employee.maritalStatus not in ['Single',False,'Widowed','Divorced'] and spouse_data
